components.description: The word "soon" with an arrow above it, pointing to the right.
components.title: Soon with Rightwards Arrow Above

description: The word "soon" with an arrow above it, pointing to the right.
title: Soon with Rightwards Arrow Above

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Words with arrows
emoji_net_data.definition: The word "soon" with an arrow above it, pointing to the right. SOON Arrow was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name â€œSoon W http://emojipedia.org/soon-with-rightwards-arrow-above/
emoji_net_data.name: SOON arrow

bn:13720042a: Occurring within a short time, or quickly.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's 'soon' arrow emoji is a bold, upward-pointing chevron rendered in a vibrant, optimistic shade of blue, with a sleek, glossy finish that catches the light.  The 3D design, characterized by smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, imbues it with a sense of momentum and anticipation, as if pushing forward towards a future event.  This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to signify that something is coming up, approaching quickly, or is on the horizon.
